name: AI Visibility Scorecard Framework - Comprehensive Glossary
description: Complete terminology glossary for all 8 ontologies in the AI Visibility Scorecard Framework. This glossary provides detailed definitions, usage contexts, business meanings, and technical specifications for every entity, property, and relationship across the framework.

entities.description: Core business entities representing key concepts in the framework

terms.aiAgentUsage: AI agents can query, create, update instances of AIVisibilityAssessment to manage comprehensive evaluation of an organization's ai visibility and market positioning
